source.content: The cartoons are here, amongst other places - http://t.co/eVkPpzpJf1 #JeSuisCharlie

comment.content: @stephenfry And what does that achieve by showing them? #Pointless and you're not Charlie, you're Stephen.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry that we will not be threatened by terrorism.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry - it shows how feeble some folks are. Getting offended over a cartoon and then killing for it.  that is insane!
@totalkharnage @stephenfry doesn't show dead people anything. Shows terrorists that they won't silence ideas. Shows solidarity w/ survivors.
@stephenfry Abhor many of them but obviously abhor murder far, far more
@stephenfry http://t.co/urzHYPKO8S
@stephenfry Huge respect to the @HuffingtonPost for printing them - we need every news company to do the same.
@stephenfry may I suggest it's time to repost your comments on taking offence? They seem very apt.
@stephenfry given one the police officers murdered was a muslim, should cartoons that could offend his family be reposted?
@MJIBrown @stephenfry That question is offensive bro.
@MaxD17 @stephenfry Oooh. I'm sure those 11 people who are dead appreciate it. Just meaningless platitudes that make you feel better.
@MaxD17 @totalkharnage @stephenfry
@Greyhound1405 @stephenfry I totally agree.
@docslacker @stephenfry And continues to offend mainstream Muslims. It was and is 'stupid' http://t.co/021W5I8115
@BonnettJosh @stephenfry not a rhetorical question. I care about freedom of speech & the policeman's family, so the issue troubles me.
@BonnettJosh @stephenfry people should be free to repost the offending cartoons, but is this a reasonable thing to do?
@totalkharnage @stephenfry considering they are the ones who drew the pictures, you are right. They do appreciate it.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry so what. No one has the right to be protected from being offended. Charlie Hebdo also satirised Jews & Christians
@totalkharnage @stephenfry the answer is more speech. Speak out, speak out against terrorists who hijack your religion.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry you can't say a religion is a religion of peace and love and then threaten to kill those who insult it.
@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry tough tatties if people take offence, it's satire. That's the point. No need to look if it's annoying
@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry That sounds like a threat.
@MJIBrown @stephenfry We can't be cowards. They are drawings FFS.
@MJIBrown @stephenfry Anything less gives in to islamist insanity.
@MaxD17 @stephenfry I'm sure their grieving friends and families are comforted. #Pointless
@docslacker @stephenfry Did they have a special edition satirising Christians and Jews? They intentionally targeted Islam to get publicity
@docslacker @stephenfry You mean like all the major Muslim nations have? http://t.co/EfTEsokdbX
@Boulton101 @docslacker @stephenfry Agreed. I take offence but I'm not about to commit murder. People disagree, it's a democracy. Move on.
@PatrickRomSim @docslacker @stephenfry how so?
@BonnettJosh @stephenfry absolutely. A heinous crime and expression of ideas must be protected. Being respectful is a choice.
@BonnettJosh @stephenfry right. Respect freedom of speech but also choose to respect the policeman's family (and other law abiding muslims).
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry And you acting like a holier than thou douchebag is helping so much? Get real. STFU.
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry you're kidding, right? These guys lived to make  comics - continuing their work is what they would want.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry biggest insult to their memory would be to concede to fear as the terrorists want. Spread the pix to honor them

@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry Yes.

Next question, or are you just going to keep being an ignorant apologist?
@totalkharnage take 5 minutes to google Charlie covers. Their take on the Christian trinity and homophobia is pretty harsh.
@totalkharnage their covers lampooning Catholic Church hypocrisy, the inability to criticise jewish extremism, etc...
@totalkharnage and I am glad and hopeful Arab and Muslim leaders are speaking out. It is a turning point. I want to support moderates.
@totalkharnage I will defend your right to belief what you want. I will stand against those who want to impose their beliefs on others.
@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry was literally the point myself and others were making to be fair...
@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry Uh...ok. Guess that says it all right there.
@MJIBrown @stephenfry Muslims are the greatest victims of their own silly religion.
@BaKaiyaTeru @MaxD17 @stephenfry Really intelligent comeback there. Well done 👏
@tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry 'comics'?? Really? They intentionally set out to cause offence and the French govt explicitly advised them
@tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry on numerous occasions not to do it. None of which condones in the slightest what the terrorists did tho
@MaxD17 @stephenfry But in the process, continuing to offend Muslims. I agree with this view http://t.co/021W5I8115
@BaKaiyaTeru @docslacker @stephenfry  apologist for what? Just because I disagree with the cartoons makes me an  apologist for terrorists?
@docslacker No problem at all with that.
@PatrickRomSim @docslacker @stephenfry because I accuse them of being stupid, means I'm threatening them? You must have a really thin skin
@BonnettJosh @stephenfry given contrast between the muslim terrorist & muslim policeman, I'm avoiding sweeping generalisations.
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry so you're saying it's okay that terrorists killed 12 people because they disagreed with free speech?
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry Its your choice to take offence. Make better choices.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry It's your choice to take offence. Make better choices.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry It sounds like you are happy they were shut up. People who kill over a cartoon are the problem, not the cartoon.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry offend them more. Offend Christians, atheists, Jews, Asians. Makes no difference.Who cares that they're offended?
@totalkharnage @BaKaiyaTeru disagree with the cartoons. But what can you expect when you criticise people for refusing to be silenced?
@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry Basically u are saying if u continue to offend Muslims u r stupid & deserve any repercussions.
@tom_wigmore_ if you read the second part of my tweet, you'll see I in no way condone that and it's horrific.
@tom_wigmore_ @totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry Fuck you islam, fuck you christian, fuck you invisible friend illness spreader.
@kirstym01189085 @totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry absolutely agree. Saying "I disagree with your point" is okay - massacre is not.
@BaKaiyaTeru @stephenfry it 'sounds' like I'm happy?? What planet are you on. You sound like George Bush 'with us or against them'
@MaxD17 @stephenfry what do we gain other than offending mainstream people?
@PatrickRomSim @docslacker @stephenfry Erm, no. That's what YOU just said. Why continually assume I mean one thing when I said the opposite?
@totalkharnage but you are saying we roll over and allow the terrorists the freedom to kill, as free expression should be repressed, no?
@RaAmarr1 @tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry Again, intelligent comeback. Well done.
@tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @MaxD17 @stephenfry Agreed and no sane person would say otherwise but that's the point, the terrorists aren't
@totalkharnage @stephenfry You keep blaming the victim, maybe you want to look into that first.
@totalkharnage @BaKaiyaTeru @stephenfry Funny u say the "with us or against us" line. I know a religion that says the same. 'Kill infidels'
@totalkharnage @stephenfry why should there be another objective? Offense can be their objective and still be valid.
@totalkharnage @docslacker @stephenfry whatever, back track all you want, you still come off as a terrorist sympathizer & apologist.
@tom_wigmore_ no. Everyone should and has free speech but most people use that responsibly. I have the right to shout Fire but don't do so
@tom_wigmore_ on a crowded train or theatre. What did they gain by doing this when no other publications did?
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry Awww. Are you offended? Are you !slam? You must be. I have two words, can u figure them out
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry btw what's yours? Don't piss of religion of peace, they might kill you?
@totalkharnage @kirstym01189085 @MaxD17 @stephenfry but you're still missing the fact that if we hide the posts, the terrorists win.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @stephenfry what if I'm offended that women are allowed to speak out of turn?
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @MaxD17 @stephenfry Terrorists follow an ideology rather than having a mental illness.
@BaKaiyaTeru @stephenfry I do think they were incredibly stupid but again, nothing justifies terrorism. Nothing.
@ZebraPinstriped @BaKaiyaTeru @stephenfry Read the Old Testament lately? http://t.co/uQBT3RF0zl
@MaxD17 @stephenfry And I reserve the right to be offended and to speak up. Why is that difficult to understand? Not advocating violence tho
@PatrickRomSim @docslacker @stephenfry aaaaaand we finally get there. Took your time. All boils down to that in the end.
@totalkharnage you're missing the point of satire. It's supposed to be borderline comedy. Those who take it otherwise need thicker skins.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ they set out to make a point. They did.
@totalkharnage by saying something no one else would. They spoke out and continued through oppression. And now the world looks on agreeing
@tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @MaxD17 @stephenfry Win what? And what do we gain?
@MaxD17 @tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @stephenfry Feel free to be offended and I defend your right to feel such way and speak out about it.
@robinandlindsay @totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @MaxD17 @stephenfry They use religion to control. They are fascists. We need humour
@totalkharnage @stephenfry That they were "stupid" is irrelevant and an insult to them. Maybe they were just braver than you.
@totalkharnage @ZebraPinstriped @BaKaiyaTeru looking to the day 99% of muslims treat scripture same way 99% Christians & Jews treat theirs.
“@totalkharnage: @ZebraPinstriped @BaKaiyaTeru @stephenfry Read the Old Testament lately? http://t.co/RvMJE6Jv5w”
@totalkharnage @stephenfry you are saying we should censor the images or at least their spread, because it is offensive. That is the issue
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry You should be more offended by those who use your religion to firebomb and kill.
@tom_wigmore_ Not sure ending up dead and being firebombed is worth the laughs but that's a decision every person makes themselves.
@MaxD17 @tom_wigmore_ Which is?
@tom_wigmore_ And what were they saying other than causing offence, intentionally?
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @stephenfry they want to instill fear.To dictate our lives. Silencing free speech is surrender
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @kirstym01189085 @stephenfry don't the cartoonists have the right to speak out about religions then?
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @tom_wigmore_ @kirstym01189085 @stephenfry the whole world is offended by what happened the offensive part was death.
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @tom_wigmore_ @stephenfry Defend your right by using guns and killing people. Grow up. Satire is healthy in society
@BaKaiyaTeru @stephenfry 'Braver'. One mans bravery is another mans stupidity. Idolising them now they're dead is easy to do.
@docslacker @ZebraPinstriped @BaKaiyaTeru Exactly my point.
@MaxD17 @stephenfry Again, do not see what is gained in the slightest from this at all. Why have many publications not published them?
@solastary @MaxD17 @stephenfry And why can't I be both? It's not a zero sum game. Again, you can be against both although I place murder
@solastary @MaxD17 @stephenfry much higher up the list than publishing some stupid, thoughtless cartoons.
@totalkharnage Death is the extreme. But these cartoonists stood for what they believed in the face of adversity. That's admirable.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ Are firebombs and bullets are a worthy response to satire? Are you actually implying people should be silent?
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ you do know us lot in Europe have been brought up with the ideal of free speech? Its our right!
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ they published hundreds of comics. I'm sure you're savvy enough to extrapolate some meaning from a few.
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 "fuck you, oppression".
@totalkharnage It's SATIRE. Would you have this much angst against The Onion? They had messages to say, and they told them.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ And here, in a quiet corner of Twitter, is the problem entirely.
@totalkharnage @docslacker yes, religious books are crap including OT. Real problem is all follwers think there's not a word wrong in Q book
@totalkharnage @stephenfry no one is forcing them to publish anything. You are either trolling or quite illogical in this it seems.
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 @stephenfry If you are go out there and do something about it. Start reaching out to those angry young men.
@totalkharnage @solastary @stephenfry they were not thoughtless. You don't get it. Never will.
@tom_wigmore_ Oh give me a break. Just mindless platitudes that are used in the papers and news to make them look like heroes. Total tripe
@solastary @tom_wigmore_ No & no. You can disagree, be offended and not advocate violence. A distinction that some on Twitter find difficult
@Themightydodgy_ @tom_wigmore_ I was born & bred in the UK so when you say 'us lot in Europe', I'm one of you. Stop being offensive.
@MaxD17 @tom_wigmore_ Help me because I fail to understand it.
@tom_wigmore_ Why is it difficult for you to understand that I don't have to agree with everything the Lord @stephenfry says? Move on.
@StanleyBurgoyne @tom_wigmore_ What's the problem with disagreeing with someones point of view and why are you so offended by that?
@totalkharnage @docslacker The day ppl r ready to admit portions of these books could be wrong & outdated, the world would be a lot better
@MaxD17 @stephenfry Not trolling mate. I think you can be for free speech, against terrorism and still not republish the cartoons. Simple.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ 1. Then go out there and teach your young men what is a worthy response. Teach them that firebombs...
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ 2. ... And bullets are not the answer. Go to your mosques and root out the ones preaching violence.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ well get on the same page then.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ a few points I can see -religions are hypocritical. Politicians (at least some) are corrupt. Etc. multiple.duh?
@totalkharnage @stephenfry I'm not saying agree with Stephen Fry, at all. I'm saying realise that you're apologising for terrorists.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ you fucking imbecile. To talk of 'offence' in the face of murder. There speaks the voice of moderate Islam.
@totalkharnage @stephenfry then you're just wrong.
@totalkharnage @MaxD17 then you missed the point of #FreeSpeech if your claim a god exists like Thor, Ra or allah without offering proof
@solastary @tom_wigmore_ Oh dear god. 'Teach your young ones' sorry but there are 1.6 billions Muslims in the world, what % do you think
@solastary @tom_wigmore_ are terrorists. You make it sound like most young Muslims are terrorists which is what some in the media peddle.
@Themightydodgy_ @tom_wigmore_ Why should I?? So because I disagree with your point of view, I'm not 'one of you'?? We live in a democracy!!
@tom_wigmore_ @stephenfry Oh dear god. So thinking the cartoons are stupid is apologising for terrorists? There goes any logical argument.
@StanleyBurgoyne @tom_wigmore_ another intelligent response.  Glad you exercise your right of free speech. Blocked.
@MaxD17 @stephenfry And that's your point of view. I disagree. End of civil conversation.
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ 1. A very tiny one. But one which has had a huge impact on ppls lives. I do not support the issues which...
@totalkharnage @tom_wigmore_ 2... Make extremists kill, yet people like me are affected by the attacks. You have the responsibility...
@solastary @tom_wigmore_ few nutters is stupid and illogical. Move one.
